name: BOT.vinnik Chess: Prodigies
description:
The soviet digital strikes back! This time he will teach you chess through memorable matches from the world's greatest chess prodigies of all time!

■ Learn the theory behind historical matches played by prodigies
■ Find out why chess pros chose the moves they did
■ Play hypothetical outcomes to understand why the losing player resigned
■ 150+ "best-move" type puzzles from famous matches
■ Memorable matches organized by chess Prodigies in 16 chapters
■ Have fun with BOT.vinnik's peculiar sense of humor!
